column5: I have a 15hp 2 stroke that I'm thinking about trading up for a 20 or 25hp motor. It early 90's, and I find her fairly noisy. 4 Strokes have my attention, but was curious if the newer 2 strokes from Johnson/Merc/Yamaha are considerably quieter than their older counterparts. What do you think?
Yeah, they are, but not as quiet as a 4 stroke.  I'm still a fan of 2 strokes though. My next upgrade will be one, as long as i can still buy one when the time comes.  S.
Thanks Sinker.  At what year would you say they made a significant improvement on the noise of them? 95? 2000?
